channel.title: Latest on Bon Aqua Computer Club
channel.description: Recent content in Latest on Bon Aqua Computer Club

item.title: Alex Jones Theater
item.description: Join Us at 7PM, March 19th! The Bon Aqua Computer Club is proud to present the Alex Jones Theater opening ceremony! Come on down to based Bon Aqua, TN and enjoy an outdoor viewing of rare Alex Jones films from the George W. Bush years. The Bon Aqua Computer Club is located at: 10582 New Cut Off Rd Bon Aqua, TN 37025 About a 35-minute drive from Nashville!

item.title: Hyperdrives For Liberty
item.description: We are going to be hosting hyperdrive archives of some media that we believe to be essential to spreading the ideas we support. Learn how to help seed & obtain this material over at the Hypercore Protocol webpage. Tom Woods Show hyper://222bfc61315f28e167b713e7252b445a99c558c328d6e31f5ce5ffd3df31627c $ hyp seed hyper://222bfc61315f28e167b713e7252b445a99c558c328d6e31f5ce5ffd3df31627c Ron Paul Liberty Report hyper://354dc85376d12e1ca2f80c77ea76f2bc238ca70fc2e621935b3ff9664e094cfd $ hyp seed hyper://354dc85376d12e1ca2f80c77ea76f2bc238ca70fc2e621935b3ff9664e094cfd

item.title: Cheap DIY Performance Stage
item.description: Music should be for all! If you agree, and have the space available to host your own performances during this unprecedented global assault upon the working class, chances are you’ll need a stage to elevate your booked acts above the audience. This is the most cost-effective DIY stage I know of. Use Merchandising Display Stands Retail stores are not exactly getting the same foot traffic to which they were once accustomed.

item.title: [Slides] Bill Gates: Definitely Up To Something
item.description: bill gates: definitely up to something

item.title: About
item.description: The Bon Aqua Computer Club is an opportunity to meet and collaborate on fun technical projects that expand our minds and enhance our self-reliance. It is also a fully-fledged performance space with outdoor event, film production, live streaming, and concert capabiltiies! Background Bon Aqua Computer Club is owned & operated by Andrew Grathwohl. I moved to Bon Aqua from New York, NY, where I spent most of my childhood and adult years until the COVID-19 lockdowns began taking place.

item.title: Run Your Mouth: Summer Porch Tour 2021
item.description: The first live event at the Bon Aqua Computer Club was a resounding success, and put us on an amazing trajectory for future endeavors. We kicked the night off with some standup sets by BK Chris, followed by Robbie TheFire Bernstein. Much light was made of the fact that I was run over by a car in Nashville the previous day. Next, we did a live Run Your Mouth podcast, where I presented a one-time-only slide deck about Bill Gates and why he is evil in far more ways than one.
